data.message: How do you go back to original profile!

replies.message: Hi there, Barbara. If you chose to make your profile picture temporary, it will automatically change back to your previous profile picture at the end of the specified time. To change your profile picture, just follow these steps: http://on.fb.me/1I1YJSi. -Kate

To Facebook,
What if there was no 'temporary' option? - does that then mean one can't change it back to the way it was?.. Will the photo you had, before adding the filter, be in amongst your other profile pictures?
I'm just enquiring before I change as I've noticed alot of people are having issues.. Also, I have the option to change my profile picture to the 'celebrate pride' one but not for the French flag (filters)
Please help!! 
Thanks in advance :)
